longTitle.name: longTitle
longTitle.content: To make provision for the pensions of certain officers transferred from the public service to the service of the Hong Kong Polytechnic and The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

section.name: s1
section.heading: Short title
section.content: This Ordinance may be cited as the Pensions (Special Provisions) (Hong Kong Polytechnic) Ordinance.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.leadIn: In this Ordinance, unless the context otherwise requires—
section.def: established office (設定職位) has the meaning assigned thereto by section 2 of the Pensions Ordinance (Cap. 89); (Amended 36 of 1987 s. 40)
Hong Kong Polytechnic (香港理工學院) means the Hong Kong Polytechnic established under section 3 of the Hong Kong Polytechnic Ordinance* (Cap. 1075);

transferred officer (轉任人員) means an officer, eligible for a pension under the Pensions Ordinance (Cap. 89), transferred from service in an established office under the Government to service under the Hong Kong Polytechnic.

editorialNote.content: * See Hong Kong Polytechnic Ordinance (Chapter 1075, 1982 Ed).

subsection.content: This Ordinance applies to any transferred officer who is specified by the Chief Executive, by notice in the Gazette, for the purposes of this Ordinance. (Amended 63 of 1999 s. 3)

A notice under subsection (1) shall specify the day on which a transferred officer shall be deemed to have transferred from service in an established office under the Government to service under the Hong Kong Polytechnic.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Application of the Pensions Ordinance (Cap. 89) to officers to whom this Ordinance applies
section.leadIn: The Pensions Ordinance (Cap. 89) shall apply to any transferred officer to whom this Ordinance applies as though—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.def: service under the Hong Kong Polytechnic or The Hong Kong Polytechnic University were included in the definition of public service in section 2 of the Pensions Ordinance (Cap. 89); (Amended 100 of 1994 s. 4)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the Hong Kong Polytechnic or The Hong Kong Polytechnic University were included in Schedule 1 to the Pensions Regulations (Cap. 89 sub. leg. A); and (Amended 100 of 1994 s. 4; 68 of 1995 s. 2)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: regulation 9 of the Pensions Regulations (Cap. 89 sub. leg. A) applied to service wholly in Hong Kong. (Amended 63 of 1999 s. 3)
